===Etymology===
[[偶然]] (ぐうぜん, ''gūzen'': “accident”) + [[察知]] (さっち, ''satchi'': “perceive”) + [[力]] (ちから, ''chikara'': “ability”)

This Japanese word was newly created by Dr. Shigekazu Sawaizumi as the translation word for [[serendipity‎]], in his publication in 2002.<ref>
{{cite-book
|last=Sawaizumi
|first=Shigekazu
|authorlink=Shigekazu Sawaizumi
|title=偶然からモノを見つけだす能力：「セレンディビティ」の活かし方
|publisher=[[Kadokawa]]
|date=2002
|location=Japan
|page=69
|isbn=978-4047040953}}</ref>
